chunks.title: Send Tokens - Simplified Guide
chunks.body: The simplest way to send tokens using NYLAGo. When users ask about sending tokens, transferring crypto, or how to send money, follow these 5 simple steps.
chunks.summary_en: Send tokens in 5 easy steps: Send tab → Enter username → Amount & token → Select blockchain → Click 'Send to X.com'
chunks.summary_zh: 5个简单步骤发送代币：发送选项卡 → 输入用户名 → 金额和代币 → 选择区块链 → 点击'发送到X.com'

simple_steps.details: Open NYLAGo and click on the Send tab to access the transfer form.
Enter the recipient's X.com username (without @ symbol). For example: alice, not @alice.
Type the amount you want to transfer and select the token type (SOL, ETH, ALGO, etc.).
Choose the blockchain network that matches your token. SOL uses Solana, ETH uses Ethereum, ALGO uses Algorand.
Click the 'Send to X.com' button to generate and post your transfer command. NYLA will execute it automatically.

quick_answer.en: To send tokens: 1) Go to Send tab, 2) Input recipient X username, 3) Enter amount and token, 4) Select blockchain, 5) Click 'Send to X.com' button.
quick_answer.zh: 发送代币：1）前往发送选项卡，2）输入收件人X用户名，3）输入金额和代币，4）选择区块链，5）点击'发送到X.com'按钮。

common_variations.response: Simply follow these 5 steps: Go to Send tab → Enter recipient username → Choose amount and token → Select blockchain → Click 'Send to X.com'.
Sending crypto is easy with NYLAGo: Send tab → Username → Amount & token → Blockchain → 'Send to X.com' button.
Transfer tokens in 5 steps: Open Send tab, enter their X username, set amount/token, pick blockchain, hit 'Send to X.com'.
Send digital money through NYLAGo: Navigate to Send tab, type recipient's username, enter amount, select network, click Send.

important_notes: The command posts automatically to X.com
NYLA executes the transfer within 30-60 seconds
